title: Girls on Rock Program Fund
description: To support activities and expenditures related to the Girls on Rock summer program housed by the Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES) Education and Outreach at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To support activities and expenditures related to the Girls on Rock summer program housed by the Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES) Education and Outreach at the University of Colorado Boulder.
